import { faBed, faCalendarDays, faCar, faPerson, faPlane, faTaxi } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import React, { useState , useReducer} from "react"; import "./header.css"; import { DateRange } from "react-date-range"; // Date Range library import "react-date-range/dist/styles.css"; // main css file import "react-date-range/dist/theme/default.css"; // theme css file // date-fns library for formating date import { format } from "date-fns"; const initialOptions = { adult: 1, children: 0, room: 1, } const reducer = (options, action) => { } function Header() { const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const [openDateBox, setOpenDateBox] = useState(false); const [date, setDate] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: "selection", }, ]); const [openOptionBox, setOpenOptionBox] = useState(false); const [options, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialOptions); return (
